1673350.name: Crush Zone: Demolition Derby Demo
1673350.description:
Start Your Engines.

Are you ready to enter the gladiatorial arena of Crush Zone? If so, bring your A-game, because only one champion will claim the grand prize. To survive, you must do whatever it takes: slam rivals into walls, hurl them into lethal traps, or send them flying from their cars with the sheer force of your vehicle. And don’t forget—your customized ride is loaded with powerful weapons that could turn the tide of battle.

The "Scenic Route"

Within the demo, contestants can jump into the free-for-all mode, either solo or with friends via local split-screen multiplayer. (Steam Remote Play Together supported!)

The Destination

In future updates, You'll be able to experience Crush Zone at full throttle levels, which include:
  • Campaign: Follow the story of Gearhead, a daring driver out to overthrow the corrupt host, Elizabeth Austin.
  • Online Multiplayer: Where you battle it out with friends, or this random guy that queued up at 3am on a Sunday night. . . But online.
  • Additional Arenas: Many more ways to be eliminated by the environment rather than other contestants.
  • Additional Game Modes: The crowd wants more. So we shall give them more.

What are you waiting for?

Join the Crush Zone games today, and rise up in the ranks to be the champion that you're destined to be.
1673350.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
